items.sentence: I've been retired for more than thirty years.
Are you sure that you want to know the truth?
Tom visited Mary at her retirement community.
Did Tom really promise you that he'd do that?
Are you going to choose or do you want me to?
Frankly speaking, I think Tom is a good boss.
Take a step back and look at the big picture.
We dissected cats during anatomy class today.
We don't have much to smile about these days.
I don't think that Tom has to do that either.
